type.name: Organization_or_person_in_organization_select
type.description: This selects between an Organization and a Person_in_organization.

type.name: Organization_or_person_in_organization_item
type.description: This select is a place holder for assignments of an organization or a person in an organization to elements of product data.

entity.name: Organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment
entity.description: An Organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment assigns an organization or a person in an organization with a role to a product data.

explicit.name: assigned_entity
explicit.description: the organization or person in organization to be assigned to product data.

explicit.name: role
explicit.description: the function served by the organization or person in organization.

explicit.name: items
explicit.description: the product data to which the organization or person in an organization is assigned.
